record.name: Change and Change Task Cost Field Validation

rule.condition: not (same(parts in $L.file, parts in $L.file.save)) or not (same(labor in $L.file, labor in $L.file.save)) or not (same(cost.currency.code in $L.file, cost.currency.code in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Parts in CurrentRecord != Parts in SavedRecord OR Labor in CurrentRecord != Labor in SavedRecord OR Cost Currency Code in CurrentRecord != Cost Currency Code in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Parts">parts</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Parts">parts</FieldName></Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Labor">labor</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Labor">labor</FieldName></Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Cost Currency Code">cost.currency.code</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Cost Currency Code">cost.currency.code</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Cost Field Validation (when ( Parts in CurrentRecord != Parts in SavedRecord OR Labor in CurrentRecord != Labor in SavedRecord OR Cost Currency Code in CurrentRecord != Cost Currency Code in SavedRecord))
